identity.name: Goladium
identity.description: A high-stakes simulation platform blending 80s arcade nostalgia with premium modern UI. Think 'Blade Runner meets Las Vegas'.
design_principles: Neon over Daylight: The sun never rises in Goladium.
Digital Tactility: Buttons should feel 'clicky' and mechanical.
Gold is God: Currency elements must always look premium and metallic.
Motion is Life: Static screens are forbidden. Use subtle glows and scans.

Button.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.6)] transition-all duration-300 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

Card.base: bg-[#0A0A0C] border border-white/5 rounded-xl overflow-hidden relative group

Input.base: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/30

layout_strategies.lobby_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-6 gap-6 p-6
layout_strategies.game_container: relative w-full max-w-5xl mx-auto aspect-video bg-black/80 border-4 border-[#222] rounded-lg shadow-2xl overflow-hidden
layout_strategies.sidebar: w-64 h-screen bg-[#050505] border-r border-white/5 flex flex-col

slot_machine_bg.usage: Background for the Slot Machine page

currency_icon.usage: Use as a texture or small icon for 'Goladium' currency display

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update `index.css` with the provided CSS variables immediately. This sets the dark theme foundation.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to `index.html` or `index.css`.
3. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, ALWAYS override the default styles with the `visual_enhancers` classes. Do not use default white cards.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the main lobby. Make the 'Slot Machine' card the largest (Hero).
5. ANIMATION: Use `framer-motion` for all page transitions and game effects. The slot machine reels MUST have a blur effect when spinning.
6. CURRENCY: Display the user balance in the top right with the 'Space Grotesk' font and Gold color (#FFD700). It should look like a digital score counter.
7. DISCLAIMER: Ensure the 'DEMO ONLY' disclaimer is visible in the footer or top bar, styled in muted red or orange.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
